message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product for $1400000. This is a significant discount considering its value to me. I believe this price is fair, given its potential worth to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I would like to propose a price of $1200000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1200000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1300000, which is a fair price considering the product's potential benefits to your business. I'm confident this offer represents a mutually beneficial deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1250000. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1250000 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to go down to $1350000, which is a significant concession. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and our desire to reach an agreement. I hope you'll consider this offer carefully.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1300000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
